${mapPut("repositoryAction","repo_conf_file:repository.xml",getStringParameter("repositoryXml"))} ${mapPut("repositoryAction","repo_conf_file:repository/nodetypes/custom_nodetypes.xml",getStringParameter("repositoryCustomNodeTypes"))} ${model.app.performRepositoryAction(model,getStringParameter("repositoryName"),"repositoryUpdate")} <#if !model.app.isRepositoryAvaliable(model)> Ok ${model.setSession(null)} <#stop "repository closed for admin purpose, ignore exceptions from this request"> <@page_overview_title/>
<#if status??> ${status}
<#else> Repository updated successfully
Ok
